articles.title: HTech launches HONOR 90 5G smartphone in UP, to target major cities first - HT Tech
articles.description: Smart devices maker HTech will target major cities of Uttar Pradesh in the first phase to market its smartphone, HONOR 90 5G, which it launched in the state on Monday.
